thumbnail.description: Relative url where the thumbnail for this element is placed

name.description: The name of the person or organization that created the resource

url.description: URL associated to this resource. Can be used for author recognition.

license.description: Information associated to the license of the resource, as provided by the author. Only creative commons and public domain licenses supported.

description.description: A brief description of the resource, including what kind of contents it has, and how many (e.g. number of animations, frames, etc.)

tags.description: A list of tags - useful for searching and grouping resources

description: A simple editor component for elements that are meant to be shared and reused through the repository.
